# NETWORK::NETWORK_SET_VOICE_ACTIVE

## Summary
Applies to all chat (lobby / in game)

## Parameters
* **BOOL** isVoiceActive

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Enables / disables voice
